Ars Nouveau.text:
mod!

Ars Nouveau is a magic mod inspired by Ars Magicka that allows players to craft their own spells, create magical artifacts, perform rituals, and much more.
Documentation is provided entirely in-game by Patchouli. To get started with this mod, craft the Worn Notebook using a book and 1 Lapis Lazuli.

Occultism.text:
mod!

Occultism is a mod inspired by the world of Jonathan Stroud's Bartimaeus. 
With the help of occult rituals you will summon spirits, also known as demons, from "The Other Place" to aid you in your adventures.
You can perform rituals to summon Familiars and Demons to help you. Mine random ores using a dimensional mineshaft, and crush ores to massively increase the value of them!

Misc Bag Upgrades.text: Everlasting, Tool Swapper, Tank, Pump, XP Pump, and Battery Upgrade

from the Sophisticated Backpacks mod!

These will come in handy for utilizing your bag in more non-conventional ways... Note: the Tool Swapper upgrade functionality is disabled while in a vault.

Bag Inception.text:
from the Sophisticated Backpacks mod!

With your mastery of looting, your accumulation of knowledge, and insane willpower, you finally have the brilliant idea, wondering why it hasn't hit you all this time, to simply put your backpacks inside of other backpacks. A peculiar thought...

Psi.text:
mod!

Psi is a magical tech spell programming mod inspired by Mahouka Kokou no Rettousei. Don't worry if that doesn't make any sense. The core of Psi is a system where you can create action sequences ("Spells") to be executed in the world. This system is followed by a leveling system containing ingame documentation and tutorials of the various concepts and pieces you'll get. The mod makes use of basic mathematical concepts, such as Vectors in its systems, which allows for great flexibility on what spells can do.

Weirding Gadgets.text:
mod!

This mod allows you to

a chunk, allowing your farms to run when you are not nearby or even offline. Chunkloading will however turn itself off when you have been offline for longer than 5 hours. If you are playing on a server, use the mod with caution as it can very quick lag the server out for your server members if over-used. By default it will

the chunk it is in, if you build a 3x3 below it using the blocks in its description, you can make it an area of 9 (3x3) chunks.
Right clicking resets your timer, sand on the bottom means it's off, sand at the top means it's on.

Dave's Potioneering.text:
mod!

Dave's Potioneering is a mod that adds an upgraded Brewing Stand that's faster and has double potion output, a new Reinforced Cauldron that allows you to coat your weapons or tools with potion effects, and a Potioneer Gauntlet that can store up to 6 potion effects and apply them on attack.

QuarryPlus.text:
mod!

After mastering mining, you can create the ultimate mining machines with the QuarryPlus mod! This adds Quarries that work much like a Buildcraft Quarry and can be enchanted to enhance them. You can also create the coveted Chunk Destroyer that can flatten an entire chunk!

Mystical Agriculture.text:
mod!

After mastering the botanical arts, you can now harness the power of mystically infused seeds with this mod. The end-all-be-all production mod, you can create seeds for almost any resource!
Items such as tools and armor are disabled!

Cagerium.text:
mod!

Cagerium is a "one block solution" for mob farming. It comes with three different tiers of cages, the first one handling passive animals, the second one aggressive mobs and the third one boss mobs! It will output the loot of the mobs in an inventory underneath the cages.

Hostile Neural Networks.text:
mod!

Hostile Neural Networks is a server-friendly mob looting system. Use a Data Model on a mob to make it's Model, then evolve your Data Model using Spawn Eggs of the corresponding type. Very powerful mod!
Note, HNN works differently in this pack! Your models won't upgrade in Simulation Chambers or gain data from kills, you need to evolve them using spawn eggs! Also needs power to work.

Ghost Walk.text: You become invulnerable from mobs for a short

of time.
Attacking anything during a Ghost Walk cancel the effect.

Mob Spawners.text:
!

iSpawners are quicker than vanilla spawners and can be configured with a mob egg to spawn the mob you want. Mob eggs can be swapped out whenever you want to.

Automatic Genius.text:
from various mods!

With Automatic Genius you can automate one of the two core concept of the game; crafting. Behold the power of full automation!

Entangled.text:
mod!

This mod adds a single new block and item, but they are very powerful. You can create an entangled block and bind it to a different block, then you can connect to the entangled block as if you were connecting to the bound block, from anywhere! Gives you more sides to work with, and wireless transfer across dimensions.

Bonsai Pots.text:
mod!

These pots can automate any tree in the game very easily by growing them in tiny pots.

Botany Pots.text:
mod!

These pots can automate any crop in the game very easily by growing them in tiny pots.
In this pack, you will also be able to upgrade the Botany Pots to enhanced tiers that have a greater output and speed.

Vault Compass.text:
!

This is the ideal tool for anyone getting lost inside the vault. While in your inventory the compass will always point to the start portal of any vault.

You can hold right mouse button while crouching to bind the compass to a custom location instead of the exit.

!

Additionally unlocks a Map of the Vault that will appear on your screen and update as you traverse rooms!

!

Also unlocks a Player Tracking Compass for finding your friend in the vault!

Archers Paradox.text:
mod!

This mod adds lots of new arrows such as explosive, piercing, homing, and more!

Functional Storage.text:
mod!

Functional Storage is an alternative take on the storage solution of Storage Drawers, with an updated look and additional functionalities.

Time in a Bottle.text:
mod!

This mod adds an amazing item called the Time in a Bottle that stores time as you play, then you can right-click on a block to speed up its tick time using your stored time! Nifty!
Also unlocks the Weather Control mod, that lets you control the time of day and the weather!

Create Ore Excavation.text:
mod for Create!

This mod adds drilling machines for fluids and ores, search for the randomly generated ore veins and generate ores to your hearts content!

Create Diesel Generators.text:
addon for Create!

This mod adds new blocks and items used to dig up oil from the ground using Pumpjacks. Useful for getting oil for PneumaticCraft or getting kinetic energy in a more interesting way!

Better Wallets.text: Gold, Emerald, Diamond, and Netherite Wallets

for Lightman's Currency!

These wallets store even more currency and have some extra features such as magneting coins into them, exchanging between currencies, and accessing your ATM remotely!

Create Balanced Flight.text:
mod!

This mod adds a block powered by kinetic energy that can give you creative flight within a radius of the block. Alternative to the Angel Block from the Vault mod!

Thermal Expansion.text:
mod!

A multipurpose mod that can double ores, increase efficiency of wood logs as well as produce some items from scratch!

Thermal Dynamos.text:
from Thermal Expansion!

Dynamos are easy to use
generators that can be upgraded and generate power out of most things, even food and enchanted books!

Mekanism QIO.text:
from Mekanism!

This part of Mekanism is a full blown storage system, with massive digital storage disks, powerful and intelligent item transfer and highly customisable crafting utilities Mekanism QIO is a beast of any storage systems.

Applied Botanics.text:
addon for Applied Energistics

This mod adds mana cells and P2P tunnels for storing and interacting with Botania mana.

Applied Compatability.text:
addon for Applied Energistics

This mod adds mana cells and P2P tunnels for storing and interacting with Botania mana, and chemical cells for storing and interacting with Mekanism chemicals.

Applied Mekanistics.text:
addon for Applied Energistics

This mod adds chemical cells and P2P tunnels for storing and interacting with Mekanism gases.

Botanical Machinery.text:
addon for Botania

For the lazy botanist, this mod adds one-block automation solutions for things like the Runic Altar, Agglomeration Plate, Alfheim Portal, etc.

Create Crafts and Additions.text:
addon for Create!

This mod acts as a bridge between electricity and Create's kinetic energy by adding an electric motor that generates kinetic energy from Forge energy and an alternator that can do the opposite. Also adds a few other useful features!
mod! That lets you enchant and disenchant items with Create!

Mega Cells.text:
addon for Applied Energistics

This mod adds massive item and fluid cells, crafting storages and units, as well as adding Chemical and Radioactive Chemical cells for Mekanism!

Extra Storage.text:
addon for Refined Storage

This mod adds massive disks for storing all your items and fluids in, as well as enhanced importers, exporters, and crafters!

Digital Miner.text:
from Mekanism!

Automatic Mining at it's finest. Place this guy down, select your filters and upgrade modules, provide it with
and watch it dig out all your treasures!

Mining Gadgets.text:
mod!

Ever wanted to mine super quick using a laser rifle? If the answer is yes, then this mod is for you. Break blocks faster and at a further distance than you thought was possible with this

Building Gadgets.text:
mods!

Building gadgets is a mega fun mod that allows you to place hundreds of blocks very quickly! A must have for any mega base builder. Building Gadgets does require
to operate, and can be charged through Enercell (which are also included in this unlock) but make sure you have access to

Pipez.text:
mod!

Transfering items around has never been easier! Pipez is the perfect entry point to any basic automation with item transfers, perfect for your farms or your generators!

Industrial Foregoing.text:
mod!

This mod contains a ton of useful blocks, useful for mob farming and crop farming. Comes with it's own power solution and storage for items and fluids. Some features of the mod have been disabled such as
Infinity Hammer, Nuke, Launcher, and Backpack

Mekanism.text:
mod!

Mekanism is a high tech mega mod! It provides you with ore processing, making you able to quintuple the outcome of a raw ore, super fast smelters and crushers and much more. Some features of Mekanism, such as the

Botania.text:
mod!

Botania is a high tech mod that is based around it's own energy mana (not to be confused with Vault Mana). It can help you build advanced redstone contraptions, duplicate items and much more, however,
in Vault Hunters when it comes to player enhancing items, all of which we have disabled.

PneumaticCraft.text:
mod!

PneumaticCraft is a tech mod that is based around air pressure and heat. You can use PneumaticCraft as your mob farm system, plant harvesting, item transferring, and more!
It also has some useful tools and armor, although some of the modules have been disabled!

Botania Flux Field.text: The Flux Field enables you to turn mana into RF to be used in other mods, like Mekanism etc.

Mekanism Generators.text:
mod!

Mekanism Generators is an addon for the Mekanism mod, but if you ever need to produce unmeasurable amounts of
then this is the mod for you. It comes complete with

Flux Networks.text:
mod!

This mod doesn't actually have the capability to generate any Forge Energy (FE), but it can
it! Flux Networks can transfer energy easily wirelessly and allows you to build up great energy deposits and even secure them from other players.

Powah.text:
mod!

Powah has a great depth and variety of

generation. You can build simple generators, passive generators, solar panels and even reactors. Powah also provides power cables and wireless power transfer that can be used to better manage the Forge Energy of your base.

Oops, All Iron Mods.text: Iron Generators, Iron Furnaces, and Iron Chests

mods!

Iron Generators are a great entry point to
that is required by other mods to run. While Iron Generators is fairly basic, it can certainly be the best choice for early to mid game power generation!
Iron Chests is a simple way to expand your storage with some upgraded chests.
Iron Furnaces provides you with upgraded furnaces, making your smelting processing much quicker.

Iron Generators.text:
mod!

Iron Generators are a great entry point to
that is required by other mods to run. While Iron Generators is fairly basic, it can certainly be the best choice for early to mid game power generation!
When paired with Iron Furnaces you'll unlock the Augment: Generator upgrade for your furnaces as well!

Junk Management.text:
!

The Void Crucible will automatically void any non-vault blocks that are dropped inside the vault, without damaging your magnet as long as you are wearing a

. These can also be crafted in the Void Crucible

You also have the option to select items or blocks that you do not want to be voided. The Void Crucible also offers a theme selector, where you can specify items based on themes to not void

This is a must have for any inventory enjoyer!
from Wold's Vaults, that lets you use the power of Vault Filters to automatically void items that match the filters in your necklace.
Additionally, your Vault Magnets will no longer take durability damage from picking up Vault Junk!

Augment Crafting.text:
!

The Augment Assembly Pedestal will allow you to craft Augments using Augment Pieces and other materials, depending on the theme.

You first have to unlock a theme before you can craft it in the Assembly Pedestal. You will automatically do that the first time you enter a theme, you may have seen the messages pop up in chat! Certain themes that are not normally obtainable will be unlocked when doing certain tasks in the vault...

Mod Box Tinkering.text:
!

The Mod Box Workstation will allow you to craft Targeted Mod Boxes that only drop items and blocks for a certain mod!
You have to have the corresponding research first before you can craft a particular box. The cost for each is dependent on the mod.

Pouches.text:
from Sophisticated Backpacks!

Pouches are your entry tool for better loot management inside a vault or on other adventures. This research also unlocks the ability to craft the
module for the belts, which can allow the belts to automatically pick up items, as well as stack more than just one stack in a slot,
Perhaps the most interesting upgrade is the Void Upgrade, allowing you to automatically void any overflow in up to 9 different slots per module.

Colossal Chests.text:
mod!

Colossal chests allows you to build massive chests that can store a lot of items in them.

More Chests.text:
mods

All of these three mods offer bigger chests and storage options without automation

Pretty Pipes.text:
mod

This mod offers basic automation for storage systems, pipes that can funnel items as well as a very basic digital interface to search through your chests.

Sophisticated Storage.text:
mod!

The ultimate bulk storage mod with massively upgradeable storage and chests and barrels that can be chained together to create an array of storage.

Cloud Storage.text:
mod!

An easy to use storage solution that adds searchable chests that can hold up to 4096 items after floating some storage up to the cloud!

Iron Chests.text:
mod!

For the Minecrafter who doesn't like thinking too much, simple, cheap, expanded chests. Nothing more, nothing less.

Drawers.text:
mod!

This mod can store multiple (thousands) of stacks of one item in one block, and drawers can be chained together to create an array of storage.
In this pack, you also get Fluid Drawers that work very simialar to the normal drawers but for fluids!

RFTools Storage.text:
mod

This is a semi basic digital storage solution, that allows you to search items and store them on disk drives. It is far more limiting than it's similarities, Applied Energistics and Refined Storage, but is cheaper to manage early and mid game.

Refined Storage.text:
mod!

This mod lets you store your items on digital data disks, like harddrives. It has a digital search terminal.
is known for it's simplicity when it comes to digital networking but have some limiting factors because of it.

Integrated Dynamics.text:
collection of mods!

This is a real bang for your buck buy right here, adding cables that you can move items, fluid, and energy with. A terminal you can connect to your storage solution.
and a plethora of other features! This one takes some brain power to make the most use of as you'll need to work with variables and operators to get the most value out of

Applied Energistics.text:
mod!

This mod lets you store your items on digital data disks, like harddrives. It has a digital search terminal.
is a bit more complex than it's similarity, Refined Storage, but has less limitations end game.

Furniture.text:
mods

These mods provides you with some fun and useful furniture as well as Bamboo Spikes that can be very useful in mob farms.

Compressed Creativity.text:
addon for Create and PneumaticCraft

This mod adds some new blocks and items that add better integration between Create and PneumaticCraft, such as letting you convert air pressure into SU/RPM.

Advanced Peripherals.text:
addon for ComputerCraft

This mod adds lots of new blocks that integrate with ComputerCraft such as the Chat Box and Environmental Scanner, among many more! Take your computing to the next level.

ComputerCraft.text:
mod

This mod provides you with the amazing power of computing! Conquer the world and improve your automation with this Lua-based machine!... or just have some fun messing around!

Decorator.text:
mods

These mods provides you with a bunch of neat looking blocks, angled blocks and special doors and windows.

More Lights.text:
mod

This mod gives you a few more options when it comes to lighting

Chef.text:
mod

This mod provides you the ability to build a real kitchen in Minecraft, that can also be automated with the use of it being a multiblock.

RFTools Power.text:
mod

This mod generates power through a few different options using fuel.

Incorporeal.text:
addon for Botania

This mod adds new ways of interacting with your Corporea system, some decorative blocks, and some other nifty and fun little things.

Easy Villagers.text:
mod!

This mod allows you to store, and interact, with villagers in block form, making it easy and fun to set up trading halls. It can also be used to farm resources with villagers, including iron.
You will also be able to craft a Barterer to make trading with Piglins much easier!
Only the auto blocks will be locked behind this unlock now, you can make normal Traders cheap and easy, enjoy!

Create Mechanical Extruder.text:
mod!

This mod adds a new block powered by kinetic energy that can be used to generate cobblestone, obsidian, and other stones. Very useful addition for automation!

Quarry.text:
mod

The Builder can be used to excavate huge areas and quarrying up all the resources. It can also be used to build things very quickly.
Note, this mod requires machine bases from RFTools Base

Garden Cloche.text:
from Immersive Engineering

This is not a full mod unlock and requires you to also unlock
The Garden Cloche can grow crops for you using power (FE) to very quickly make simple farms of most growable blocks in Minecraft.
Note, this mod requires infrastructure from Immersive Engineering

Phytogenic Insulator.text:
from Thermal Expansion!

This is not a full mod unlock and requires you to also unlock
The Phytogenic Insulator can duplicate/generate a lot of farmable items for you using power (FE).
Note, this mod requires infrastructure from Thermal Expansion.

Create.text:
mod!

This mod allows you to farm and process resources. It does not require classic modded power (FE), but instead uses rotational force through water or heat sources to generate energy for itself.

Immersive Engineering.text:
mod

This mod can both produce power, process ores and generate some resources. It uses big multistructures that all consume power (FE) to run.

Engineers Decor.text:
mod

This mod adds a lot of industrial decoration, as well as entry level power generation and processing.

Iron Furnaces.text:
mod!

This mod provides you with upgrades furnaces, making your smelting processing much quicker.

RFTools Base.text:
mod!

This mod doesnt provide much on it's own, but is required to make the machine cases for all other RFTools Mods.

Hexcasting.text:
mod!

This mod adds stack-based programmable spellcasting. Complicated mod, but you can do some cool stuff with it!

LaserIO.text:
mod!

LaserIO is a useful mod that seeks to replicate the mechanics of EnderIO - allowing you to interact with items, fluids, energy, and redstone - all from the same block face! There is limitless potential for logistics around transportation of resources.

Super Factory Manager.text:
mod!

SFM is a powerful mod that gives you the Factory Manager block, cables to connect to your manager, and a disk you can program scripts into to control your base!

Xnet.text:
mod!

Xnet is a very powerful infrastructural mod, allowing you to transfer items, power (fe), fluids and redstone through one single pipe. It requires in game "programming" to work, but can make your contraptions considerably smaller and more efficient.

Modular Routers.text:
mod!

This mod can help you transfer both items and experience wirelessly. It provides you with the ability to pick up things from the floor and is very useful in mob farms.

Dark Utilities.text:
mod!

This mod provides you with the ultimate utilities for mob farming and moving entities around using conveyour belts.

Waystones.text:
mod!

Waystones provides you with an ease of travel option. They are craftable and can be interacted with only after you unlock this research. You can travel within and cross-dimensions, however, they do not work in the vaults.

Torch Master.text:
mod!

A very small but useful mod that allows you to craft torches and lamps that can block both hostile and passive mob spawning in an area of 64 blocks around it. This can not be used in the vaults to prevent mobs from spawning however.

Trashcans.text:
mod!

This mod provides you with easy to use trashcans, where you can void not just items, but excess fluids and energy (FE) as well.

Elevators.text:
mod!

This mod provides you with ways of travelling vertically. The basic Elevators, when placed vertically from one another within a certain distance gives you the ability to SHIFT / JUMP on them to go DOWN / UP.

mod! That adds a Travel Staff and Travel Anchors that let you travel to any Travel Anchor you are looking at! Note, the Teleportation Enchantment is disabled in vaults should you find a way of accessing it...

RFTools Utility.text:
mod

This mod provides you with some good infrastructural options and most importantly it supports wireless redstone signals using infinite different channels. Very useful for making your contraptions neater and more efficient.

Dimensional Storage.text:
mod

This mod allows you to transfer items wirelessly from one dimensional chest to another. It can be used as public inventories and as private inventories. Very useful for farms instead of piping items all over the place. This mod however, does not work in the vaults.

Jetpacks.text:
mod

This mod allows you to craft jackpacks that can be used to fly, they work inside vaults and fuel out of power (FE)

Danks.text:
mod

Provides you with large storage cubes (danks) that can hold thousands of items per slot. They are very useful for organising your inventory and for mass looting vaults.

Extendo Arm.text:
from the Create mod

The Extendo Arm is an off hand item that will extend your reach, both block placement/breaking reach as well as fighting reach for mobs.
In addition to this research you will need the

Powerful Arrows.text:
mod

This includes better arrows so that your bow will still be useful in the vault in mid game. You can craft explosive arrows, piercing arrows, high damage arrows among others. In addition, this allows you to craft the very special "Rocket Arrow", turning your bow in to a TUBBO-Launcher

Trader.text:
, allowing them to be part of your base and sell you things that are useful.
Each level in this talent increases the quality of the trades. Upon reaching the final level, there is a chance that
are "Salesmen" instead, working for you to obtain Vault Gold.

Vault Blacksmith.text: Unlocks the ability for you to craft and work with
. Without this research you can still wear and roll
you find, but you can not craft it. In addition, some other useful utilities are unlocked, such as the

Vault Powerups.text: . This research is also required in order to consume

Vault Looter.text: Vault Charm and the Inscription Table

The Vault Charm Inscription Table allows you to 'voidlist' any item you want in your base, and while carrying the Vault Charm in your inventory it will automatically void any matching blocks or items that gets picked up, keeping your inventory clean and neat!

Adding an item to the void list inside the Charm Inscription Table will void any item regardless of sub-data (for example enchanted books), so beware of what you add!

Vein_Miner.text: Vein mine several blocks at once, used by holding down the ability key while breaking blocks.

Self_Sustain.text:
Eat your own flesh to replenish food, at the cost of taking some damage.

1:

Dash.text: Dash in the direction you are facing, can also be used in combination with an Elytra.

Mega Jump.text: Launch yourself high up in the sky with a mega jump.
scales with levels in Mega Jump.

Regeneration.text:
Gain regeneration permantently, regardless of gamerule.
Levels increases
Taking Regeneration will permantently lock Vampirism

Vampirism.text:
Regain health when dealing damage to mobs.
Levels increases
Taking Vampirism will permantently lock Regeneration

Resistance.text: (base 30%), allowing to stack higher level of

Thorns.text:
to deal damage to the attacker when being hit.
The damage reflected scales with your current damage.
This thorns does not increase the durability loss on your gear

Fatal_Strike_Chance.text:
of landing a fatal strike hit while attacking.
This stacks with any other fatal strike chance additions, the total can be seen in your statistics tab.

Fatal_Strike_Damage.text:
dealt when landing a fatal strike hit on attack.
This stacks with any other fatal strike damage additions, the total can be seen in your statistics tab.

Thorns_Damage.text:
dealt to mobs when being hit with a thorns trigger.
This stacks with any other thorns damage additions, the total can be seen in your statistics tab.

Thorns_Chance.text:
to trigger thorns when being attacked.
This stacks with any other thorns chance additions, the total can be seen in your statistics tab.

Carapace.text: Passively further increases your damage reduction by providing a sum of extra

Fire_Resistance.text: Grants immunity to lava and fire damage.

Twerker.text:
Grants the ability to speed up tick rate on several objects while holding shift.
The
scales with levels in this talent.
Crops, Melons, Pumpkins, Cactus, Sugar Cane
Crops, Melons, Pumpkins, Cactus, Sugar Cane, Baby Animals

Elvish.text: Permanently remove all possible fall damage.

Angel.text: and have them grant you Creative Flight. Angel blocks can not be placed inside vaults, and have a radius of 64 blocks per block.
Also allows you the ability to craft and wear Angel Rings (note: ALL forms of creative flight are disabled in vaults).

Reach.text: for interacting with blocks, chests and other tile entities in the game.

Safety First.text: Unlocks the Torchmaster Mod allowing you to prevent the natural spawning of mobs.

Organisation.text: Unlocks the Trashcans, Dank storage and PickleTweaks Mods.

Storage Noob.text: Unlocks the Iron chests and Metal barrels Mods.

Storage Master.text:
Unlocks the Storage Drawers, Modular Routers and storage overhaul Mods. 
To unlock Storage Master, you must unlock the Storage Noob research first.

Storage Refined.text:
Unlocks the Refined Storage, Refined Storage adds Mods. 
To unlock Storage Refined, you must unlock the Storage Master research first.

Storage Energistic.text:
Unlocks the Applied Energistics and addons Mods. 
To unlock Storage Energistic, you must unlock the Storage Master research first.

Decorator Pro.text:
Unlocks the Macaw's all mods, Environmental Materials, Block Carpentry and Platforms Mods. 
To unlock Decorator Pro, you must unlock the Decorator research first.

Engineer.text: Unlocks the Engineer's Decor and Iron Furnaces Mods.

Super Engineer.text: Unlocks Immersive Engineering and the Moving Elevators Mod!

One with Ender.text: Unlocks the Ender mail and Elevators Mods.

The Chef.text: Unlocks the Cooking for Blockheads Mod!

World Developer.text: Unlocks RFToolsBase and Comforts, so you can develop the world while sleeping outside.

Redstoner.text: Unlocks the Gauges and Switches, and RFToolsUtility Mods.

Let there be light!.text: Unlocks the Simplylight and Neoncraft Mods.

Power Overwhelming.text: mod! A mod capable of generating massive amounts of power through various different systems.

Power Manager.text: mod, allowing you to transfer energy wirelessly and overview any FE/RF consumption and production.

Uber Sand.text: mod, which gives you a new block, Snad, which increases growth tick speed for anything placed on it.

Piper.text: mod, which gives you access to a very simple digital storage solution using pipes. This mod can also be used to transfer items between containers.

Creator.text: mod, a mod with lots of utility to create automation, FE/RF independantly.

Nuclear Power.text:
Unlocks the MekanismGenerators mod! 
To unlock Nuclear Power, you must unlock the Tech Freak research first.

Parry.text: (base 40%), allowing to stack higher level of

Summon Eternal.text:
You summon Eternals from their pool of Eternals on eternal pedestals.
The eternal summoned is completely random, if an eternal dies in the vault they need to be ressurected in their cryo chamber, using a life scroll, before they can be summoned again.
There is also a
that an ancient spawns instead of an eternal if you own at least one ancient.
scales with levels in Summon Eternal.

Cleanse.text: Clear any negative effects affecting you.
is reduced by levels in Cleanse.

Rampage.text: You gain a massive damage boost for a short

Tank.text: You gain a massive damage reduction boost by applying stacking

Stone_Skin.text: Increases your knockback resistance, reducing the amount of knockback of projectiles and melee hits.

Looter.text: Increases the amount of rare loot found in vault chests, treasure chests, altar chests and boss crates by applying additional

to you.

Rare loot includes, but is not limited to star essence, skill essence, vault gear, vault diamonds, vault essence

Chunky.text: Further increases your amount of total

Step.text: Grants the ability to step up full blocks.
This is not the same as Minecraft's "Auto Jump"

Execute.text: The next attack performed within 5 seconds after activating Execute will deal an amount of
based on the target's total hit points.

Ninja.text: Passively further increases your ability to
an incoming attack, resulting in no damage taken

Altar Automation.text:
mod!

This mod allows you to automate your crystal altar with either Refined Storage or Applied Energistics.

Cable Tiers.text:
Refined Storage addon mod!

This mod adds enhanced versions of the importer, exporter, disk manipulation, constructor, destructor, and requester. They come in 3 different tiers and are progressively faster and have more filter slots.

Little Logistics.text:
mod!

This mod is focused on efficient, affordable, long-distance transport. It adds vessels and locomotives you can use to move item, fluids, and energy around great distances. Additionally, comes with a faster version of hoppers, and a fluid version of hoppers.
The mod also comes with Create support so you can put Create contraptions on top of your barges or train cars!

Auto Refill.text: can automatically refill your hotbar with your selected blocks and/or items.

Auto Feeding.text: can automatically feed you directly from your pouches, belts & backpacks and removes the need to eat food manually.
Refill, Compacting, and Auto-Smelting, Smoking, and Blasting
upgrades. That will let you refill items in your hand from your backpack automatically, compacting items in 2x2 and 3x3 recipes, and automatically process items in your bag!

Double Pouches.text: , which offers more storage space and one more upgrade slot than Pouches.

Scanner.text: mod, which offers an FE powered device that can scan for entities, blocks, and in this pack, a special Vault Ores module! Consider it like Hunter in a device!

Belts.text: , which offers more storage space than Double Pouches.

Backpacks.text: , which offers more storage space and two more upgrade slots than Belts.

Big Backpacks.text: , which offers more storage space and two more upgrade slots than Backpacks.
In Wold's Vaults, you can also craft the Beeg Backpack, an even BIGGER backpack.

Soul Harvester.text: which is a much faster way of breaking down items to

.

The Soul Harvester automatically pulls from an inventory above it, and automatically pushes to an inventory below it, and it is, very fast.

Also comes with the Vault Salvager! A new block that works like the Vault Recycler but stores an unlimited number of vault scrap and netherite scrap, and has more room for faceted focuses. It's also much faster, and purple!
